feed.title: Tauticord Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Slash commands to generate graphs for play count/duration statistics, similar to the "Graphs" tab on Tautulli's dashboard.
  • See documentation for more details.

Related PRs

  • [feat] New slash command to generate play count/duration graphs by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/228

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.6.0...5.7.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [CHANGED] Use new base image for Docker container to improve build times for ARMv7 platforms (avoid having to build wheels for every dependency)
  • No notable change to final Tauticord Docker image size, no expected impact on end-users

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.7.0...5.7.1

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [CHANGED] Remove usage percentage from disk stats to save space
  • [ADDED] Users can use a non-empty space string (" ") to override default name/emoji values for stats channels

Related PRs

  • [fix] Improvements to text formatting by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.7.1...v5.7.2

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIX] Do not attempt to retrieve CPU and RAM stats from Plex if missing required Plex Pass
  • [CHANGED] Disable stream termination feature by default (avoid Plex Pass requirement issues)
  • [ADDED] Log when an enabled feature is missing the Plex Pass requirement

Related PRs

  • [fix] Account for Plex Pass requirement for CPU and RAM stats feature by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/233

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.7.2...5.7.3

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Support for Tautulli v2.15.0.
  • [REMOVED] Support for Tautulli v2.14.0 and v2.14.1. See announcement.

Related PRs

  • [chore] Add Tautulli v2.15.0 support, drop v2.14.0 and v2.14.1 support by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.7.3...5.8.0
